CodeBlockMethod.Name: GetPooledEntity
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- Find disabled object for index, object in ipairs(self.objects) do if object.Enable == false then return object end end
-- No disabled object in the pool: Create new one return self:CreateNewObject()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: CreateNewObject
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local object = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.modelId, self.objectName, Vector3.zero, self.Entity) object.Enable = false table.insert(self.objects, object)
return object

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: for i = 1, self.initPoolSize do self:CreateNewObject() end
